item.description:
Come enjoy sampling German wine and jazz under the stars! Practice speaking the German language, sample wine from Austria/Germany and listen to some cool jazz in Hartford's beautiful Bushnell Park. Please bring: your own picnic blanket or lawn chair, a little food to share,a wine glass, and a small bottle of German wine.
Find us between the state Capitol building and the bandshell, to the left of the stage just before the hill. (If you imagine the face of a clock with the bandshell being 12:00, we would sit at postion 9:00). Look for a small German /Austrian flag. The concert starts at 6PM and goes until about 8:30.
This is a chance to hear some world-famous jazz musicians for FREE and practice your German too!
Rain date would be the next Monday.
Regular German meetup still takes place at Panera.
item.name: German Wine and Jazz
